channel.title: aws on Jonathan Loscalzo
channel.description: Recent content in aws on Jonathan Loscalzo

item.title: Docker Swarm - From Dev to Prod
item.description: Docker Swarm tips - Links I gathered some links that helped me to enhance my knowledge to carry out docker to production. Also, it is important to read ssh tips. Cheatsheets docker compose bash General (docker, swarm and machine) https://docs.docker.com/compose/ docker swarm services, contraints https://docs.docker.com/registry/recipes/nginx/ docker-swarm, deploying a spring boot microservices on aws docker-swarm rocks: my excuse for using docker and swarm! docker-swarm: aws, ec2 and docker-machine (Berk Gokden’s blog) Best Link (in spanish): gitlab for ci/cd, docker-machine for infrastructure (I’ve just used generic driver), and docker-swarm Cron and background jobs https://medium.
